definition: a decade of a century (e.g. the Sixties)/age/era/period/CL:個|个[ge4]
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
beginning of an age/beginning of a decade
chronology (the science of determining the dates of past events)
What decade are you living in?/That's so out-of-date!
pinyin: dou1 shen2 me5 nian2 dai4 le5

sentences.english: The Kizil Grottoes were built one century early than the Mogao Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 克孜尔石窟营造年代早于敦煌莫高窟一个多世纪。

sentences.english: In this age of the keyboard , some people seem to think handwriting lessons are on the way out.
sentences.chinese: 在这个键盘的年代，有人似乎认为书法课即将灭亡。

sentences.english: The roads and aqueducts of Rome have been the admiration of all after ages.
sentences.chinese: 古罗马的大道和高架渠在其后的年代一直受到羡慕。

sentences.english: Guillotine is a masterpiece of Aitmatov in 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 《断头台》是艾特玛托夫八十年代的力作。

sentences.english: Days of Being Little Kings, fiction film, 80
Chinese Hamsters were introduced into the UK pet market in the 1960s.
sentences.chinese: 二十世纪六十年代被引进到英国宠物市场。

sentences.english: Since ancient times, many colorful banditry commotions more unprecedented.
sentences.chinese: 自古边关多匪患，骚动年代更空前。

sentences.english: Do you prefer New York now, or did you prefer it more in the 70s?
sentences.chinese: 你比较喜爱现在的纽约，还是七零年代的呢？

sentences.english: It was the mid-1970's and I was your age.
sentences.chinese: 当时是70年代中期，我正是你们现在这个年龄。

sentences.english: In the 1990s, Harman Kardon was running into trouble.
sentences.chinese: 90年代，哈曼卡顿的经营陷入了困境。

sentences.english: This book inflects chinese society in the 30s.
sentences.chinese: 这本书反映了30年代的中国社会。

sentences.english: He led a peace movement in the late 1930’s.
sentences.chinese: 他在二十世纪三十年代末的时候领导了一个和平运动。

sentences.english: Something happened in the late 1950s and early ’60s.
sentences.chinese: 五十年代末六十年代初有不少这种事。

sentences.english: Something happened in the late 1950s and early ’60s.
sentences.chinese: 五十年代末六十年代初有不少这种事。

sentences.english: People back in the 1950s to make the first PV.
sentences.chinese: 人们早在本世纪50年代就制成了第一个光电池。

sentences.english: Even in the darkest ages humanity has endured.
sentences.chinese: 即使在最黑暗的年代人也能忍耐。

definition: to be in vogue/to be prevalent
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
